titles.title: To prohibit the closure of Walter Reed Army Medical Center notwithstanding the 2005 recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2280-2285)
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E496-497)
Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary:
3/8/2007--Introduced.
Prohibits the Secretary of Defense from closing Walter Reed Army Medical Center, notwithstanding the 2005 recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission pursuant to the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990.
